name: Dungeon of fears
description:
Tower of fears, for intellivision jam 2019.

Controls: arrow keys and spacebar to attack.

Ive used resolution of 320x192 with 16 color pallet one color each sprite and 16x16 pixels sprite size.

Used clickteam fusion 2,5 https://www.clickteam.com/
Bfxr for sound effects. very usefull https://www.bfxr.net/
Famitracker for music first time using it.http://famitracker.com/

Hope you enjoy.

Thanks!
